Package polimi.ingsoft.server.model.boards

Class Board

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.model.boards.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Player's Board: every card placed from a player ends in this object

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(GameCard initialCard, boolean isFaceUp, Boolean isFirstPlayer, PlayerColor color)
      Board builder
      Parameters:
      initialCard - defines the player's first card, always to be put at coordinates 0,0
      isFaceUp - defines initialcard's orientation
      isFirstPlayer - defines wether a player is the first player or not
      color - defines player's color

    • add

      public boolean add(Coordinates position, GameCard card, boolean facingUp)
      Adds a card in board after proper controls
      Parameters:
      position - defines coordinates where the card would be put
      card - defines the card that should be put in board
      facingUp - defines card's orientation
      Returns:
      true if card has been placed in board,otherwise false

    • check

      public boolean check(Coordinates position)
      Controls whether a certain position(coordinate) is available for placing cards
      Parameters:
      position - the position to check
      Returns:
      true if a card can be put in the defined position, otherwise false
